query: SELECT CONCAT('ID:', id, ' | OpenID:', openId, ' | Name:', IFNULL(name,'NULL'), ' | Email:', IFNULL(email,'NULL'), ' | Role:', role, ' | NdmoRole:', ndmoRole) as user_info FROM users;
